name: eccentrically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a strange or unusual way that is sometimes humorous: I used to dress quite eccentrically. Every item in his eccentrically decorated home tells a bizarre story. See
eccentric
More examplesFewer examplesThe house has an ancient wooden staircase that seems to lean eccentrically, like something from a ghost story.Even when sober, he often behaved eccentrically.Yes, sometimes they act eccentrically. But we shouldn't be afraid about that.
